ResearchProjectDef.label: Unrestricted Experimentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can further our understanding of chemicals if we just stop worrying about the consequences for the test subject. Unlocks new experimental drugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mutagenics
ResearchProjectDef.description: We have discovered compounds that cause mutations that aren't immediately fatal...most of the time. Unlocks basic mutagenic drugs and plantable compounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Raider Pacification
ResearchProjectDef.description: We need to more research subjects. We can make better weapons for incapacitating, but not killing, raiders. Unlocks Force Shotgun.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mutagenic Implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: We have made many new discoveries through our mutagenic experiments. We can now create mutated organs for our colonists. Unlocks Minor Mutagenic implants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bare Metal Cybernetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Regular bionics trade efficiency for saftey. We aim to remedy that mistake. Unlocks special cybernetics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mutagenic Apotheosis
ResearchProjectDef.description: We have reached the pinnical of our mutagenic discoveries. Unlocks final tier of implants and bionics.
